column10: 2015 at her residence. she was born in london
column13: the daughter of the late joseph o. and violet buckley stoops. linda attended parkersburg high school and was a homemaker
column14: loving wife and mother. she was a member of emmanuel fellowship church. she is survived by her husband of 43 years

column22: geraldine dornick (bill) of mineral wells; one brother
column27: three great-grandchildren and many nieces and nephews who loved her dearly. in addition to her parents linda was preceded in death by one brother

column35: with pastor tom blake officiating. burial will immediately follow the service at evergreen south cemetery
